title: Help me unban my friend from real life
body: Ma' dear friend, Bob, has spent like 200$ in League stuff ....and because of that, frustration has taken over him and he wont come outside to play with me ...he only says the words "I'm banned" ....I ,a humble league player (unranked btw xD ) , come in front of you to ask for help ,no....TO BEG FOR HELP. If you have some words of wisdom for my friend Bob please share them with us , he needs every piece of help he can get :< PLEASE HAVE MERCY! {{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body: Get bob to meet rob so they can sob and then get a key fob and eat corn on the cob with some lovely gob stoppers that they will then lob at the mob. Then they can turn the door knob and you prob will get him outside his job.
